    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mammoth Lord Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3443) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #177: Burning Tundra](/Sources.aspx?ID=116) pg. 77</row>

**Archetype** [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170)

**Prerequisites**
[Ride](/Feats.aspx?ID=835)

</column>

---

You've undertaken the ultimate challenge of the Mammoth Lords and tamed a megafauna. You gain a megafauna you tamed as a [young animal companion](/Rules.aspx?ID=151). Your megafauna animal companion must be a megafauna appropriate to the Realm of the Mammoth Lords; see the What Counts as Megafauna? sidebar for guidance and examples. While an animal companion usually starts as Small, you can begin with a Medium version of that animal (changing no statistics other than its size).

 Contrary to the usual rules for animal companions, this feat can give you a second animal companion. If you have more than one animal companion, you can adventure with only one of them at a time. You can switch between them like a [beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50) does. You gain the Call Companion action, as the beastmaster archetype, and you follow all the other rules found in the Call Companion sidebar.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you've gained two other feats from this archetype.

<title level="2">Mammoth Lord Dedication leads to...</title>
[Gigantic Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3452), [Mammoth Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=3444), [Mature Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3445), [Megafauna Veterinarian](/Feats.aspx?ID=3446), [Specialized Megafauna Companion](/Feats.aspx?ID=3453), [Speech of the Mammoth Lords](/Feats.aspx?ID=3447), [Staggering Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=3450), [Stalwart Mind](/Feats.aspx?ID=3449), [Unbreakable Bond](/Feats.aspx?ID=3451)
